p: Conditions with a good prognosis for recovery include autoimmune and congenital myasthenia, metabolic myopathies, inflammatory myopathies without severe systemic damage (in particular, pulmonary fibrosis), muscle channelopathies, and most neuropathies, hereditary or acquired [ 45]. The positive criteria for a good prognosis for intensive care in these patients are no major cardiac or respiratory damage and no major disability.
